title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
synopsis: Three friends on an adventurous road trip/bachelor party in Spain learn some lessons about themselves and each other that will change them forever.

title: Barfi!
synopsis: Years after rejecting Barfii, a hearing and speech impaired young man, for a more 'appropriate' suitor, Shruti finds herself falling for him.

title: Long Time Running
synopsis: This documentary follows the 2016 tour of beloved rock band The Tragically Hip as they make their way across Canada one last time.

title: Sebastian Maniscalco: What's Wrong with People
synopsis: With his uproarious tirade on modern behavior and decorum, the popular comic tackles the question we've all asked in this hilarious standup special.

title: Song of the Sea
synopsis: The last of a magical race of seals that become human on dry land, Saoirse and her brother must return to the sea in this animated adventure.

title: Attacking the Devil: Harold Evans and the Last Nazi War Crime
synopsis: Intrepid newspaper editor Harold Evans wages an ongoing battle to expose the truth about a dangerous drug and obtain compensation for its victims.

title: Room
synopsis: Kidnapped, confined to a tiny room and raped, a young woman gives birth to a son. When he reaches his fifth birthday, she begins plotting an escape.

title: Nazi Concentration Camps
synopsis: Shocking footage shows Nazi concentration camps after liberation, including Buchenwald and Ohrdruf, where Gen. Eisenhower ordered local Nazis to tour.

title: Kahaani
synopsis: Pregnant and alone in the city of Kolkata, a woman begins a relentless search for her missing husband, only to find that nothing is what it seems.

title: Contratiempo
synopsis: After waking next to his now-dead lover in a hotel room, a young businessman hires a prominent lawyer to figure out how he ended up a murder suspect.

title: Chasing Coral
synopsis: Divers, scientists and photographers around the world mount an epic underwater campaign to document the disappearance of coral reefs.

title: Baahubali: The Beginning (Malayalam Version)
synopsis: Villagers in the kingdom of Mahismati rescue a baby who is destined to embark on a heroic quest in this Malayalam version of S.S. Rajamouli's epic.

title: Baahubali: The Beginning (Hindi Version)
synopsis: Villagers in the kingdom of Mahismati rescue a baby who is destined to embark on a heroic quest in this Hindi version of S.S. Rajamouli's epic.

title: Baahubali: The Beginning (Tamil Version)
synopsis: Villagers in the kingdom of Mahismati rescue a baby who is destined to embark on a heroic quest in this Tamil version of S.S. Rajamouli's epic.

title: Lagaan
synopsis: In 1890s India, an arrogant British commander challenges the harshly taxed residents of Champaner to a high-stakes cricket match.

title: Monty Python's Life of Brian
synopsis: Born in a stable in Judea, Brian grows up to join a group of anti-Roman zealots, but his fate keeps getting confused with that of a certain carpenter.

title: Angamaly Diaries
synopsis: After growing up amidst the gang wars of his hometown, Vincent forms an entrepreneurial squad of his own and ends up on the wrong side of the law.

title: Haider
synopsis: Shahid Kapoor delivers a searing performance in this Bollywood take on Hamlet that unfolds amid Kashmiri culture and history.

title: PK
synopsis: After the successful 3 Idiots, Aamir Khan reteams with Rajkumar Hirani to play an alcoholic social crusader in a political satire on the state of corruption in India.

title: Udaan
synopsis: Upon returning to his industrial hometown, a young man must decide whether to follow his own dreams or acquiesce to his father's plans for his future.

title: A Wednesday
synopsis: After receiving an anonymous tip about a bomb, a police commissioner must negotiate with the terrorist, who demands the release of four militants.

title: Baahubali: The Beginning (English Version)
synopsis: Villagers in the kingdom of Mahismati rescue a baby who is destined to embark on a heroic quest in this English version of S.S. Rajamouli's epic.

title: Shonar Pahar
synopsis: An older woman's unique friendship with a young boy inspires her to examine the strained relationship she shares with her married son.

title: The Dawn Wall
synopsis: Cameras follow Tommy Caldwell and Kevin Jorgeson as they take on the staggering challenge of free-climbing Yosemite’s most formidable rock formation.

title: The End of Evangelion
synopsis: Seele orders an all-out attack on NERV, aiming to destroy the Evas before Gendo can trigger Third Impact and Instrumentality under his control.

title: Uyare
synopsis: An aspiring pilot fights for her future -- and justice -- after surviving an acid attack from her abusive boyfriend.

title: Dil Chahta Hai
synopsis: Inseparable childhood friends Akash, Sameer and Siddharth are just out of college. Nothing comes between them -- until they each fall in love.

title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
synopsis: A shy freshman struggling with depression deals with his best friend's suicide and his first love in this engaging coming-of-age tale.

title: Mission Blue
synopsis: This documentary follows oceanographer Sylvia Earle's campaign to save the world's oceans from threats such as overfishing and toxic waste.

title: Sin City
synopsis: In these intertwined tales, an ex-con avenges a hooker's death, a gumshoe gets mixed up with dangerous vixens, and a cop saves a dancer from a rapist.

title: Mike Birbiglia: My Girlfriend's Boyfriend
synopsis: On this painfully honest but hilarious journey, Birbiglia struggles to find reason in an area where it may be impossible to find: love.

title: The Pursuit of Happyness
synopsis: When Chris and his son are evicted, they face trying times as a desperate Chris accepts an unpaid internship at a stock brokerage firm.

title: Ip Man
synopsis: An occupying Japanese general challenges Chinese men to duels to prove the superiority of the Japanese, but Ip Man refuses to fight -- at first.

title: The Battered Bastards of Baseball
synopsis: The colorful true story of the Portland Mavericks, a scrappy, independent baseball team of underdogs started by actor Bing Russell in the 1970s.

title: Trailer Park Boys: Xmas Special
synopsis: See what Sunnyvale Trailer Park was like back in the day, featuring Randy as a prostitute, J-Roc before he rapped and Barb and Lahey still together.

title: Jerry Seinfeld: I'm Telling You for the Last Time
synopsis: Months after his classic TV sitcom ends, the legendary comic returns to his stand-up roots to deliver his best jokes on a sold-out international tour.

title: Inequality for All
synopsis: Former U.S. Labor Secretary Robert Reich makes a compelling case about the serious crisis the U.S. faces due to the widening economic gap.

title: The King's Speech
synopsis: In this biographical drama, Britain's King George VI struggles with an embarrassing stutter until he seeks help from speech therapist Lionel Logue.

title: Jeff Dunham: Arguing with Myself
synopsis: Playing straight man to partners half his size, ventriloquist Jeff Dunham -- one of America's funniest comics -- slays audiences across the country.

title: Shuddhi
synopsis: An American woman on a revenge mission travels to India and befriends two journalists seeking justice for violent crimes against women.

title: Jim Gaffigan: Beyond the Pale
synopsis: Comedian Jim Gaffigan cuts loose on a variety of topics, including Hot Pockets, holidays, Catholicism and his favorite activity: doing nothing.

title: Dallas Buyers Club
synopsis: Refusing to accept a death sentence from his doctor after being diagnosed with AIDS in 1986, Ron Woodroof smuggles medications from abroad.

title: Groundhog Day
synopsis: Sent to cover the annual ritual of groundhog Punxsutawney Phil, a self-centered TV weatherman mysteriously begins living the same day again and again.

title: Her
synopsis: Love comes to a lonely writer in the sleekest of packages when he finds himself falling for the advanced operating system he bought to run his life.

title: Kal Ho Naa Ho
synopsis: In this topnotch Bollywood import, a trio of friends on a shared journey of self-discovery learn to celebrate life -- no matter what it may bring.

title: G.O.R.A
synopsis: Carpet dealer and UFO photo forger Arif is abducted by aliens. On the planet Gora, he helps friends escape from a meteorite strike and find freedom.

title: Vizontele
synopsis: In 1974, a rural town in Anatolia gets its first television set -- an event that's met with both excitement and trepidation by the villagers.

title: Dhanak
synopsis: A movie-loving 10-year-old and her blind little brother trek to meet Indian superstar Shah Rukh Khan for help in getting the boy an eye operation.

title: Cristina
synopsis: In this short documentary, 37-year-old Cristina valiantly battles cancer while doing all she can to encourage others to live in the moment.

title: A Plastic Ocean
synopsis: When he discovers the world's oceans brimming with plastic waste, a documentary filmmaker investigates the pollution's environmental impacts.

title: Manu
synopsis: The relationship between a painter and his admirer unfolds as an abstract, twist-filled hide-and-seek game against the backdrop of murder and revenge.

title: Waar
synopsis: When Pakistani authorities learn of a looming terrorist strike, they ask a retired intelligence officer to counter the attack before it's too late.

title: Wrong Side Raju
synopsis: The life of a chauffeur and part-time bootlegger takes a turn toward the dramatic when a girl approaches him to buy illicit alcohol.

title: I Am Kalam
synopsis: An intelligent boy born into poverty befriends the son of a once noble family and is inspired by the life of India's president to pursue an education.

title: Pad Man
synopsis: Despite public humiliation and resistance, an entrepreneur markets a hygienic, low-cost sanitary pad that even India's poorest women can afford.

title: Struggle: The Life and Lost Art of Szukalski
synopsis: Artists in LA discover the work of forgotten Polish sculptor Stanislav Szukalski, a mad genius whose true story unfolds chapter by astounding chapter.

title: Tim Minchin: So F**king Rock
synopsis: Comedic pianist Tim Minchin performs a host of his catchy songs that touch on everything from the Middle East to the healing power of canvas bags.

title: Magnolia
synopsis: Through chance, human action, past history and divine intervention, an eclectic cast of characters weaves and warps through each other's lives.

title: Love O2O
synopsis: A college stud tries to level up his relationship with a computer science major after becoming attracted to her skills in an online role-playing game.

title: Hazaaron Khwaishein Aisi
synopsis: In a politically charged India of the 1970s, three friends are transformed by personal ideologies, dangerous ambitions and matters of the heart.

title: Tottaa Pataaka Item Maal
synopsis: Exasperated with living in perpetual fear for their safety, four women kidnap a man to show him the realities of being female in Delhi.

title: Marriage Story
synopsis: Academy Award-nominated filmmaker Noah Baumbach directs this incisive and compassionate look at a marriage coming apart and a family staying together.

title: Bawarchi
synopsis: A dysfunctional middle-class family is transformed by the attentions of their talented new chef -- until he vanishes along with their valuable jewels.

title: The Death of Mr. Lazarescu
synopsis: The plot of Romanian director Cristi Puiu's real-time drama is simple, following the travails of an ailing old man who waits for his illness to overtake him as a weary paramedic shuttles him between hospitals.

title: Trailer Park Boys: Say Goodnight to the Bad Guys
synopsis: A year after the Season 7 finale, the boys are poised to live the good life. But an old enemy throws a wrench in things once again.

title: Diana: In Her Own Words
synopsis: Featuring archival footage and personal recordings, this documentary offers candid insight into the life of the beloved princess.

title: The Artist
synopsis: Winner of five Oscars, this black-and-white silent film follows the romance between a silent-era legend on a downward spiral and a rising starlet.

title: Moon
synopsis: As he nears the end of a lonely three-year stint on the moon base Sarang, astronaut Sam Bell begins to hear and see strange things.

title: Mystic River
synopsis: Tragedy reunites childhood friends Sean, Dave and Jimmy when they're linked together in a murder investigation about Jimmy's teenage daughter.

title: Jiro Dreams of Sushi
synopsis: This documentary profiles sushi chef Jiro Ono, an 85-year-old master whose 10-seat, $300-a-plate restaurant is legendary among Tokyo foodies.

title: Salam - The First ****** Nobel Laureate
synopsis: Shunned by his country due to religion, Abdus Salam strives for an achievement that would define modern physics and redefine his place back home.

title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc III - The Advent
synopsis: A year after he left the Band of the Hawk, Guts rejoins them in an epic battle to vanquish the God Hand and save Griffith from a hellish fate.

title: John Mulaney: The Comeback Kid
synopsis: Armed with boyish charm and a sharp wit, the former 'SNL' writer offers sly takes on marriage, his beef with babies and the time he met Bill Clinton.

title: The Ivory Game
synopsis: Filmmakers infiltrate the corrupt global network of ivory trafficking, exposing poachers and dealers as African elephants edge closer to extinction.

title: Justin Timberlake + the Tennessee Kids
synopsis: On the final nights of a world tour, director Jonathan Demme captures what makes the show soar: gifted musicians, deft dancers and a magnetic star.

title: Unchained: The Untold Story of Freestyle Motocross
synopsis: This adrenaline-rush documentary traces the rise of freestyle motocross, arguably the world's most extreme sport, and spotlights its pioneers.

title: Neal Brennan: 3 Mics
synopsis: Wicked one-liners and soul-baring confessions converge in this uniquely intimate stand-up special from 'Chappelle's Show' co-creator Neal Brennan.

title: Oasis: Supersonic
synopsis: This film details the rise of British rock group Oasis and the creativity and chaos that brothers Noel and Liam Gallagher brought to the iconic band.

title: Harold and Lillian: A Hollywood Love Story
synopsis: Storyboard artist Harold Michelson and his film researcher wife, Lillian, recall the influence they had on 60 years of Hollywood's biggest hits.

title: Houston, We Have a Problem!
synopsis: Blending fact with myth, this conspiracy-minded docufiction argues that the U.S. purchased Yugoslavia's secret space program in the 1960s.

title: Icarus
synopsis: An American filmmaker and cyclist unwittingly wades into a global scandal when a Russian scientist leaks shocking details of a vast doping conspiracy.

title: Roots
synopsis: This documentary explores the rich heritage of Indian classical music and the reasons behind its modern decline in popularity.

title: Ricky Gervais: Humanity
synopsis: In his first special in seven years, Ricky Gervais slings his trademark snark at celebrity, mortality and a society that takes everything personally.

title: Mango Dreams
synopsis: Concerned that dementia will soon steal his most cherished memories, a Hindu doctor hires a Mulsim rickshaw driver to take him to his childhood home.

title: Secret Superstar
synopsis: A talented teenage singer-songwriter living amid domestic abuse becomes a YouTube sensation after a video in which she hides her identity goes viral.

title: Monty Python: Live at Aspen
synopsis: The members of Monty Python reunite on stage to talk about making their iconic show that changed sketch comedy forever.

title: Monty Python: Live at The Hollywood Bowl
synopsis: Film clips and Terry Gilliam animations feature in this live-to-tape performance of greatest hits, including 'Travel Agent' and 'Solo Wrestling.'

title: John Mulaney: Kid Gorgeous at Radio City
synopsis: John Mulaney relays stories from his childhood and “SNL,” eviscerates the value of college and laments getting older in this electric comedy special.

title: For Here or to Go?
synopsis: A software engineer must decide if he'd rather navigate America's frustrating visa renewal process or simply return to his home country of India.

title: Awe
synopsis: Disparate characters, including an aspiring time traveler, a phony chef, a drug-addicted waitress and several others, share a surprising connection.

title: Seven Sundays
synopsis: A dying father asks his busy and grown children to spend their Sundays with him, forcing his family to confront their issues before it's too late.

title: Badla
synopsis: When a woman is accused of killing her lover, a renowned lawyer is hired -- but the more they try to  untangle the truth, the more convoluted it becomes.

title: The Irishman
synopsis: Hit man Frank Sheeran looks back at the secrets he kept as a loyal member of the Bufalino crime family in this acclaimed film from Martin Scorsese.

title: Lakshya
synopsis: After dropping out of the army, a spoiled teenager reenlists and proves his mettle by becoming an officer just as war breaks out.

title: 3 Deewarein
synopsis: A reporter interviews three convicts on death row for a documentary but as their stories emerge, so do her own true motivations for soliciting them.

title: InuYasha: The Movie 3: Swords of an Honorable Ruler
synopsis: The Great Dog Demon beaqueathed one of the Three Swords of the Fang to each of his two sons. Now the evil power of the third sword has been awakened.

title: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory
synopsis: Zany Willy Wonka causes a stir when he announces that golden tickets hidden inside his candy bars will admit holders into his secret confectionary.

title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
synopsis: When his family moves from Berlin to Poland, a young boy befriends a boy who lives on the other side of the fence, unaware he's a Jewish prisoner.

title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
synopsis: In a backwater Iowa town, young Gilbert is torn between taking care of his troubled family and a girl who shows him new possibilities for his life.

title: Back to the Future Part II
synopsis: Marty and Doc are at it again in this sequel to the 1985 blockbuster as the time-traveling duo head to 2015 to nip some McFly family woes in the bud.
